title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as “ollama”.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as “ollama”.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM interface.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot bridge: invoke Ollama models via slash commands in any Discord server.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model using the official API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with streaming chat completions and embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom GGUF models tested with Ollama.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in Docker.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chat UI for Ollama with Next.js and Tailwind.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Official example repo showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B and load it into Ollama.
